item.description:
You are invited to a Thanksgiving Dinner Party at a private home in Cumberland, RI. 

Children are welcome.  The exact address and phone number will be sent to yes rsvps on Nov. 21.

Each Adult is to bring an item to share (see list below).  If you are bringing children please bring their beverage of choice also. 

You can also bring board games and music (cds or ipods ).  Anyone interested in an after dinner walk we can do that also.

 

Please RSVP yes only if you are DEFINITELY 100% sure you are attending.

 

Please write what you will bring in the RSVP comment box so every one can see - and we don’t have repeats. 

 If you are signing up for appetizers please arrive on time.  If you will be late please sign up for dessert. 

 

You are invited to a Thanksgiving Dinner Party at a private home in Cumberland, RI.

Children are welcome.  The exact address and phone number will be sent to yes rsvps on Nov. 21.

Each Adult is to bring an item to share (see list below)and BYOB.  If you are bringing children please bring their beverage of choice also.

If you don’t want to cook or bring food you can make a monetary (cash) donation toward food and party goods.

You can also bring board games and music (cds or ipods ).  Anyone interested in an after dinner walk we can do that also.

Please RSVP yes only if you are DEFINITELY 100% sure you are attending.

If you are a no then do not rsvp at all - thanks!

Please write what you will bring in the RSVP comment box so every one can see - and we don’t have repeats.

If you are signing up for appetizers please arrive on time.  If you will be late please sign up for dessert.

Paper Goods utensils, dishes, glasses,  Tea, coffee - will be supplied by Germaine.

If you don’t want to cook you can make a monetary (cash) donation toward food and party goods.
item.how_to_find_us: The address will be sent the day before
item.name: Give Thanks Together
